item.title: My First Post
item.description: %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import matplotlib.mlab as mlab mu = 100 # mean of distribution sigma = 15 # standard deviation of distribution x = mu + sigma * np.random.randn(10000) num_bins = 50 n, bins, patches = plt.hist(x, num_bins, normed=1, facecolor='green', alpha=0.5) C:\Users\LiChunlin\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\matplotlib\axes\_axes.py:6462: UserWarning: The 'normed' kwarg is deprecated, and has been replaced by the 'density' kwarg. warnings.warn("The 'normed' kwarg is deprecated, and has been " y = mlab.
